name: pipeline-approval
description: A short description of my extension
author: gustavobergamim

scripts.package:dev: npm run compile:dev && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file configs/dev.json --output-path out
scripts.package:qa: tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file configs/qa.json --output-path out/qa
scripts.package:prod: tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file configs/prod.json --output-path out/prod

publish:dev:pat.darwin: npm run compile:dev && tfx extension publish --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file configs/dev.json --output-path out --share-with gustavobergamim --token $AZ_DEVOPS_MARKETPLACE_PAT
publish:dev:pat.win32: npm run compile:dev && tfx extension publish --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file configs/dev.json --output-path out --share-with gustavobergamim --token %AZ_DEVOPS_MARKETPLACE_PAT%
publish:dev:pat.linux: npm run compile:dev && tfx extension publish --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file configs/dev.json --output-path out --share-with gustavobergamim --token $AZ_DEVOPS_MARKETPLACE_PAT
